A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: As a huge fan of the original trilogy\, this movie misuses characters and tries inject the \"humor\" of Jar Jar Binks into General Hux and others and has more cringe moments of any other Star Wars movie.  Whole Finn storeline was shoehorned in because of his popularity in TFA and based on Disney these days - \"Diversity\".  Don't understand why they didn't fix the storeline to help with Carrie Fisher's passing\, seemed like it wouldn't have been that hard with a few reshoots and editting.  Now JJ has to deal with that huge burden.  Leia could have passed and another could have stayed...
